LanguageData.USAC_Wreck_Cobalt.label: M7 Cobalt wreck
LanguageData.USAC_Wreck_Cobalt.description: The destroyed remains of a USAC mech unit. Can be reinstalled as decoration or deconstructed for basic salvage materials.
